short_summary: Request for proposal for off-base cleaning services for Canadian Forces Base Comox
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for janitorial services at the Canadian Forces Base Comox, in Comox BC. The requirement is for a 1-year Contract with an option to extend for 4 additional 1-year option periods.
full_summary:
**********************************
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Title

*   English: W0133-24T090 - Off-Base Cleaning Services
*   French: W0133-24T090 - Services de nettoyage hors base

### Reference Information

*   Reference number: WS4432616493-DOC4537195889
*   Solicitation number: WS4432616493
*   Amendment number: 2

### Tender Details

*   **Publication date:** April 14, 2024
*   **Tender closing date:** May 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
*   **Expected contract start date:** None
*   **Expected contract end date:** June 1, 2025

### Procurement Overview

*   **Procurement method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Notice type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement category:** SRV
*   **Trade agreements:** The contract is open to suppliers from countries that have a trade agreement with Canada.

### Location

*   **Regions of opportunity:** None
*   **Regions of delivery:** British Columbia, Canada

### Client Information

*   **Contracting entity name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting entity address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **Client notice URL:** <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19393868?extsite=MTkzOTM4NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Contract Requirements

*   **Contract duration:** The contract is for a year with an option to extend for four additional one-year option periods.
*   **Services required:** The Department of National Defence (DND) requires janitorial services at the Canadian Forces Base Comox, in Comox, British Columbia.

### Contact Information

*   **Contact name:** Wong, Katie (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact email:** [katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
